---
title: Fiscal Reporting
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readxl)
library(DT)
sbs <- read_excel("sub_list.xlsx", sheet = 2)
sbs <- sbs %>% select(`CSU, Chico Research Foundation - Center for Healthy Communities (CHC)`, SOW_Name, `Year Two Internal Acronym`) %>% filter(!is.na(`Year Two Internal Acronym`)) %>% filter(!is.na(`CSU, Chico Research Foundation - Center for Healthy Communities (CHC)`))
names(sbs) <- c("subcontractor", "SOW_Name", "y2n")
```


**Before submitting make sure the name of your files contain both the quarter (eg. Q3) and the short code name for your campus. Search the table below to find your campus short code name.**

```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
display_tbl <- sbs %>% select("SOW_Name", "y2n") %>% 
  rename(Campus = SOW_Name,Shortcode = y2n) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Campus))

datatable(display_tbl, class = 'cell-border stripe', options = list(pageLength = 5))
```
